title: MWIC Bonus Episode 2: Autocar meets Bentley CEO Frank Walliser
description: Autocar's Editor-in-chief Steve Cropley talks to Bentley's CEO Frank Walliser about all things Bentley In this bonus podcast episode, Autocar's Editor-in-chief, Steve Cropley, meets Bentley CEO Frank Walliser, who previously enjoyed a long spell at Porsche, about all things Bentley - and how he won't try to turn it into making cars that are too sporty.
